content:
ICS 1C HW 2 for QQ Skeleton -- Heading

About QQ Skeleton

Name:Tristen Reinhart
E-mail: eapu399@ea.oac.uci.edu
Major: political science

Three neat Web finds:

  1. One intersting thing that I found was the different programs that I can log onto to find information. First, galaxy has an unlimited amount of information from politics to computers to sports. IO also found thye yahoo which also has a lot of information from various universities and oither schools of thought.
  2. THe second intersting thing I found was the ability to log onto various television progams- such as the Late Night with David Letterman monologues.
  3. The third aspect of the web that I found intersting was the homepages that are developed for each individual piece of information. After seeing what takes place in class to make a program, iI appreciate more the information that is presented. #3.

Questions I can now answer
  1. explain the process of cashe and why us it so important
  2. who is the governor of Texas and why is he so important
  3. what is markup language
  4. who is the dean of social sciences and what is his background
  5. how can the Library of Congress help me do research for my political science classes
  1. explain the process of cashe and why us it so important
    My answer is when one is working with several Web documents at once, and one wants to keep lookig at just one or two of them, it takes too much time to find the document, make the connection, and then download the page. This is where cache is useful. Cache keeps the last few documents in memory, reloads them instantly when one requests it. Mosaic checks locally to see if it is there before sending the HTTP to requests it. THis is very useful because one can run multiple windows of the program while being able to browze at the same time, and one does not have to separate all windows from each other. ... QQ1

    Return to list of questions.

  2. who is the governor of Texas and why is he so important
    My answer is Governor Bush. The reasons why he is so important is because not only is he former President Bush's son, but he was also to beat a major Texan, former governor, Ann Richardson. She was known throughout Texan, and she also received a major endorsement form Ross Perot. As it is well known, Ross Perot was a contender against President George Bush in the last Presidential race. Governor Bush has also shown that there are still political alignments going on at all times. Maybe Governor Bush will be a future Presidential , or vice presidential contender.... QQ2

    Return to list of questions.

  3. what is markup language
    My answer is actually more simple than I originally thought. Mark up is the act of inserting additional text into a document which is not usually visible to the reader nor is it part on the context. Mark up enhances the document in some way such as capturing the document structure or adding references to the additional list - also known as tags.... QQ3

    Return to list of questions.

  4. who is the dean of social sciences and what is his background
    My answer is the dean of social scienes is professor William R. Schonfeld. His number is for undergraduate counseling is (714) 824-6803 and his number for graduate counseling is (714) 824-5924. He is a political science professor who received his Ph. D at Princeton University. if one needs to get in touch with him electronically, his e-mail address is wrschonf@ci.edu

    Return to list of questions.

  5. how can the Library of Congress help me do research for my political science classes
    My answer is not a very simple one. I tried to look at many resources and what I found was the the world Wide Web has a number of resources that have direct information on the library of Congress, political elections and much more information. For example, the first link that I found was through yahoo- it is an index on the federal government information on the Internet, also a Comprehensive government resourse. guide

    Return to list of questions.

Submitted February 08, 1995 for ICS 1C
